partnerNationality.label: What is your partner’s nationality?
partnerNationality.strlen: Your partner’s nationality must be 500 characters or less.

partnerCountry.label: Which country has your partner come from?
partnerCountry.required: Enter the country your partner has come from.
partnerCountry.strlen: The country your partner has come from must be 500 characters or less.
partnerCountry.change: Change which country your partner has come from

partnerLastCameToUk.legend: What date did your partner last come to the UK?
partnerLastCameToUk.required: Enter the date that your partner last came to the UK.
partnerLastCameToUk.format: Enter a real date that your partner last came to the UK.
partnerLastCameToUk.future: Enter a date that your partner last came to the UK that is in the past.
partnerLastCameToUk.change: Change what date your partner last came to the UK

partnerCameToUkToWork.legend: Did your partner come to the UK to work?
partnerCameToUkToWork.required: Select yes if your partner came to the UK to work.
partnerCameToUkToWork.change: Change whether your partner came to the UK to work

partnerNoRecourseToPublicFunds.legend: Does your partner’s passport say they have no recourse to public funds?
partnerNoRecourseToPublicFunds.required: Select yes if your partner’s passport says they have no recourse to public funds.
partnerNoRecourseToPublicFunds.change: Change whether your partner’s passport says they have no recourse to public funds

partnerLivedInUkBefore.legend: Has your partner lived in the UK before?
partnerLivedInUkBefore.required: Select yes if your partner has lived in the UK before.
partnerLivedInUkBefore.change: Change whether your partner has lived in the UK before

partnerLastLeftUk.legend: What date did your partner last leave the UK?
partnerLastLeftUk.required: Enter the date that your partner last left the UK.
partnerLastLeftUk.format: Enter a real date that your partner last left the UK.
partnerLastLeftUk.future: Enter a date that your partner last left the UK that is in the past.
partnerLastLeftUk.change: Change what date your partner last left the UK

partnerFamilyReunionScheme.legend: Has your partner come to the UK under the Family Reunion Scheme?
partnerFamilyReunionScheme.required: Select yes if your partner has come to the UK under the Family Reunion Scheme.
partnerFamilyReunionScheme.change: Change whether your partner has come to the UK under the Family Reunion Scheme
